Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at NH Salamanca Palacio de Castellanos, you'll be centrally located in Salamanca, steps from Las Duenas Convent and San Esteban Convent. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Cathedral of Salamanca and Pontifical University of Salamanca.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 62 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms with bathtubs or showers are provided. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Additional amenities include wedding services and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. This hotel has 4 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at NH Salamanca Palacio de Castellanos, you'll be centrally located in Salamanca, steps from Las Duenas Convent and San Esteban Convent. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Cathedral of Salamanca and Pontifical University of Salamanca.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Las Duenas Convent - 0.1 km / 0 mi
San Esteban Convent - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Cathedral of Salamanca - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Pontifical University of Salamanca - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Old Cathedral of Salamanca - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
Salamanca Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Art Nouveau and Art Deco Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
University of Salamanca - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Santa Clara Convent - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Plaza Mayor - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Palacio de Congresos Conference Center - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
La Purisima Church - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Monterrey Palace - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Las Ursulas Convent and Museum - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Archbishop Fonseca College - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Salamanca (SLM-Matacan) - 13.8 km / 8.6 mi
Valladolid (VLL) - 107.4 km / 66.7 mi

The preferred airport for NH Salamanca Palacio de Castellanos is Valladolid (VLL).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
